General.Name: Biotalys NV
General.Description: Biotalys NV, an agricultural technology company, discovers and develops novel biological products for the protection of food and crops. It primarily develops biofungicides, bioinsecticides, and biobactericides. The company was formerly known as Agrosavfe NV. Biotalys NV was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Gent, Belgium.
